data.eml:eml: Balligratus, new genus of wingless ground beetles from equatorial Andean montane forest (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Lachnophorini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Moret, Pierre, Ortuño, Vicente M. (2017): Balligratus, new genus of wingless ground beetles from equatorial Andean montane forest (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Lachnophorini). Zootaxa 4258 (2): 101-120, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4258.2.1
